B

Blob - Interface in org.akubraproject
Interface to abstract the idea of a blob in the blob store.
BlobStore - Interface in org.akubraproject
Interface to abstract the idea of a general transaction based blob store
BlobStoreConnection - Interface in org.akubraproject
Interface to abstract the idea of a connection to a transaction based blob store
BlobStoreConnectionWrapper - Class in org.akubraproject.impl
Simple wrapper implementation that delegates listBlobIds and sync calls to the wrapped blob-store-connection, and implements close to close both this connection and the underlying connection.

U

UnsupportedIdException - Exception in org.akubraproject
This exception is thrown by a blob store to indicate that the application supplied blob identifier is outside the set of all possible identifiers for blobs in this store.
UnsupportedIdException(URI) - Constructor for exception org.akubraproject.UnsupportedIdException
Construct an instance for the given unsupported identifier with no further details.
UnsupportedIdException(URI, String) - Constructor for exception org.akubraproject.UnsupportedIdException
Construct an instance for the given unsupported identifier with a detailed message.
UnsupportedIdException(URI, String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.akubraproject.UnsupportedIdException
Construct an instance for the given unsupported identifier with a detailed message and the underlying cause.
